content.prompt: Frederick Jackson Turnerâ€™s theory emphasized the significance of the frontier for all of the following reasons EXCEPT:

choices.label: An open frontier led to the development of the unique American character.
Free land promoted freedom of opportunity on the frontier.
The western frontier had land that could be distributed to former slaves.
The frontier was a safety valve for the excess population of eastern cities.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
